page.title: 19* PUPILS LIKES & DISLIKES *
page.content:
{CONTINUATION OF EXPLANATION OF LIST {OF LIKES AND DISLIKES OF A TYPICAL {TEN YEAR OLD ST. KEVINS MIDDLE SCHOOL { PUPIL.
{4.}THE RECORDER IS AN INSTRUMENT WITH HOLES THAT YOU COVER WITH YOUR FINGERS, YOU ALSO BLOW INTO IT. POP MUSIC - MUSIC AND SONGS MADE BY A BAND OF PEOPLE SUCH AS "WHAM". {5.}RED IS A BRIGHT COLOUR, IT IS THE FIRST COLOUR IN THE RAINBOW, YOU FIND A RAINBOW IF THE SUN SHINES AFTER IT HAS BEEN RAINING. {6.}SPAIN IS A COUNTRY IN THE SEA IT IS IN THE ATLANTIC OCEAN I THINK. CRISPS - THIN SLICES OF POTATO FRIED IN OIL AND FLAVOURED.
{ /concluded on page 20........
